text: Jasmine tea ( or ) is tea scented with the aroma of jasmine blossoms. Jasmine tea has green tea as the tea base; however, white tea and black tea are also used. The resulting flavour of jasmine tea is subtly sweet and highly fragrant.Gong, Wen. Lifestyle in China. 五洲传播出版社, 2007. Retrieved October 23, 2010, from ==References== Category:Tea
title: Jasmine tea
